about_the_game:
Allows you to change the character on the home screen to 'Mei Animal Version'.

* Costumes will be available after the completion of the story dungeon, 'A Maze-like Garden', and can be accessed with the Costume Change command under either Status on the Home Menu, or the Profile command in the Gallery.

content_descriptors.notes:
Omega Labyrinth Life is a Rogue-like RPG where female characters brave dungeons.

This game contains partial nudity, sexual themes, harsh language, and content that may not be suitable for all ages. Although it does not contain any graphic sexual content, it does have a mode where characters can be touched and as such may not be appropriate for the workplace. 

*All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

detailed_description:
Allows you to change the character on the home screen to 'Mei Animal Version'.

* Costumes will be available after the completion of the story dungeon, 'A Maze-like Garden', and can be accessed with the Costume Change command under either Status on the Home Menu, or the Profile command in the Gallery.
